item.title: Surprise! You Can Now Screen Record on iPhone with Music Playing - Here's How!
item.description: Introduction Are you an iPhone user who loves to take screenshots, record videos, and share them with friends? If so, you’ll be excited to learn that you can now screen record with music playing in the background! This new feature allows you to capture videos with your favorite tunes playing in the background, making your videos more entertaining and fun to watch. What is Screen Recording? Screen recording is a feature that allows you to capture what is happening on your iPhone’s screen.
